name: Running With Weapons
description:
You are running from the end of the world, and it won't be easy, but you have weapons to help you get as far as you can from the end of the world.

W ASD FGH CVB

W Select the Upward Weapon A Select the Block-Destroying Weapon S Select the Downward Weapon D Select the Straight-Forward Weapon

F, V, or H Jumping C, G, or B Shooting
